node.title: Getting Started with GraphQL and ASP.NET Core
Choosing a Static Site Generator
node.description: I choose a static site generator from among a long list including Jekyll, Gatsby, Statiq, Hugo, VuePress, Next.js, Nuxt.js and Gridsome.

node.title: .NET Boxed
node.description: .NET Boxed is a set of project templates with batteries included, providing the minimum amount of code required to get you going faster.
